Dr. Adamu Onu is an experienced physician / biostatistician with strong leadership skills, proven track record and a demonstrated history of working in the public and private healthcare and in public health in administrative, clinical roles and consulting roles with excellent outcomes. Skilled in developing applications in R, SPSS, Stata, and Python. Possess practical experience in healthcare information technology (HIT).
